content: Hi everyone! I've been meaning to try and write a couple of name resolution patches for a while (https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/63720 and adding an additional note for the "unresolved import" error if there's a binary crate with the same name). I just ran into the latter issue again, which motivated me to join this Zulip and try again. I have been using Rust for two years, and at work I write assemblers and linkers.
